data.title: View recommendations
data.description: View recommendations from the Microsoft 365 Defender portal

userActivity.Value: Navigate to https://security.microsoft.com/security-recommendations and review the recommendations for your environment.

backgroundActivity.Value: What is the security portal doing?
The Microsoft 365 Defender portal is analyzing your environment and providing recommendations based on the security posture of your environment.

userActivity.Value: In this scenario we are reviewing teh Update Oracle Kernel-uek for Linux

backgroundActivity.Value: What's does the portal show us?
The portal advises us to update the kerel, it shows the list of exposed/installed devices, and any associated CVEs related to this vulnerability.
We can also see the list of CVEs associated with this vulnerability.

data.title: Update the kernel
data.description: Update the kernel on the Oracle Linux server

userActivity.Value: One method is to update the kernel using uptrack. This allows us to update the kernel without rebooting the server.

backgroundActivity.Value: The output shows the kernel being updated. It displays CVE that are being addressed, and the kernel version being installed.

data.title: Check the Security Portal
data.description: Check the Microsoft 365 Defender portal for updates

userActivity.Value: Navigate back to the Microsoft 365 Defender portal and review the recommendations.
The portal will take some time to update depending on how often the agent reports back to the MDE service.

backgroundActivity.Value: What's does the portal show us?
The portal shows that the Oracle Kernel has been updated, and the CVEs have been addressed.
